title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 883.5 - Historical use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 883.5 - Historical use

State Regulations
A person who or which could not for any reason use, take, withdraw or divert waters of the basin from the place in question on March 31, 1971, shall not be entitled to a certificate of entitlement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
883.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
